nodes.text: Darakaer was a long-dead male warrior, sailor, and Irmenu folk hero who spawned his own legend. It was said he was forced into eternal sleep to save the Irmenu, though he was to be awakened if his people were ever in trouble again by a certain rhythm played on his drum. Gilad Pellaeon used the legend as a secret symbol between himself and Natasi Daala.
